channel.title: CVE Feed for F5 -- BIG-IP AFM & PEM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for F5 -- BIG-IP AFM & PEM

item.title: CVE-2022-41813|2024-08-03T12:56:38.300Z -- f5 -- big-ip%20afm%20%26%20pem
item.description: In versions 16.1.x before 16.1.3.1, 15.1.x before 15.1.6.1, 14.1.x before 14.1.5, and all versions of 13.1.x, when BIG-IP is provisioned with PEM or AFM module, an undisclosed input can cause Traffic Management Microkernel (TMM) to terminate.
